titleStmt.title: The speech of Captain Henry Warren at the place of execution neer Wapping-Dock, on Thursday last, being the fourteenth of this instant October, 1652. With his prayer immediatly before his death, and a perfect narrative of all his proceedings at sea, in relation to the late King, Parliament, and the Dutch fleet. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Warren, Henry, d. 1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Horton, and are to be sold at the Royoll [sic] Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
